name: MazeRace (LeoLitz)
description:
This is a simple project made in Java with the help of processing, it was born out of my desire to use an algorithm I had in mind for making specific mazes.

The objective is to make the opponent lose, a player loses if their own maze becomes increasingly longer to traverse till it would get longer than the grid allows.

Every time a player completes a maze both mazes are refreshed, both in such a way to make the optimal path longer than it was before, but whoever caused the refresh gets penalized less.

The player on the left moves with WASD, the one on the right with arrow keys.

Oh right, there are powerups, I'll let you discover what they do.
